verses.verse: Now those that sealed <S%H2856><s%> were <S%H5166><s%>: Nehemiah the governor <S%H8660><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hacaliah <S%H2446><s%>, and Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%>,
Maaziah <S%H4590><s%>, Bilgai <S%H1084><s%>, Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>; these were the priests <S%H3548><s%>.

And the Levites <S%H3881><s%>: namely <S%H3442><s%>, Jeshua the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azaniah <S%H245><s%>, Binnui <S%H1131><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Henadad <S%H2582><s%>, Kadmiel <S%H6934><s%>;
and their brethren <S%H251><s%>, Shebaniah <S%H7645><s%>, Hodiah <S%H1941><s%>, Kelita <S%H7042><s%>, Pelaiah <S%H6411><s%>, Hanan <S%H2605><s%>,
The chiefs <S%H7218><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>: Parosh <S%H6551><s%>, Pahath-moab <S%H6355><s%>, Elam <S%H5867><s%>, Zattu <S%H2240><s%>, Bani <S%H1137><s%>,

And the rest <S%H7605><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, the priests <S%H3548><s%>, the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, the porters <S%H7778><s%>, the singers <S%H7891><s%>, the Nethinim <S%H5411><s%>, and all they that had separated <S%H914><s%> themselves from the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the lands <S%H776><s%> unto the law <S%H8451><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, their wives <S%H802><s%>, their sons <S%H1121><s%>, and their daughters <S%H1323><s%>, every one that had knowledge <S%H3045><s%>, and understanding <S%H995><s%>;

They clave <S%H2388><s%> to their brethren <S%H251><s%>, their nobles <S%H117><s%>, and entered <S%H935><s%> into a curse <S%H423><s%>, and into an oath <S%H7621><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> in God <S%H430><s%>'s law <S%H8451><s%>, which was given <S%H5414><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, and to observe <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and his ordinances <S%H4941><s%> and his statutes <S%H2706><s%>;

and that we would not give <S%H5414><s%> our daughters <S%H1323><s%> unto the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, nor take <S%H3947><s%> their daughters <S%H1323><s%> for our sons <S%H1121><s%>;

and if the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> wares <S%H4728><s%> or any grain <S%H7668><s%> on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> to sell <S%H4376><s%>, that we would not buy <S%H3947><s%> of them on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, or on a holy <S%H6944><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>; and that we would forego <S%H5203><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, and the exaction <S%H4853><s%> of every debt <S%H3027><s%>.

Also we made <S%H5975><s%> ordinances <S%H4687><s%> for us <S%H5414><s%>, to charge ourselves yearly <S%H8141><s%> with the third part <S%H7992><s%> of a shekel <S%H8255><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>;

for the showbread <S%H4635><s%>, and for the continual <S%H8548><s%> meal <S%H4503><s%> - offering, and for the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, for the sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, for the new moons <S%H2320><s%>, for the set feasts <S%H4150><s%>, and for the holy <S%H6944><s%> things <S%H2403><s%>, and for the sin-offerings to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and for all the work <S%H4399><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>.

And we cast <S%H5307><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%>, the priests <S%H3548><s%>, the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%>, for the wood <S%H6086><s%> - offering <S%H7133><s%>, to bring <S%H935><s%> it into the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>, according to our fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, at times <S%H6256><s%> appointed <S%H2163><s%>, year <S%H8141><s%> by year <S%H8141><s%>, to burn <S%H1197><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, as it is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%>;

and to bring <S%H935><s%> the first-fruits <S%H1061><s%> of our ground <S%H127><s%>, and the first-fruits <S%H1061><s%> of all fruit <S%H6529><s%> of all manner of trees <S%H6086><s%>, year <S%H8141><s%> by year <S%H8141><s%>, unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>;

also the first-born <S%H1060><s%> of our sons <S%H1121><s%>, and of our cattle <S%H929><s%>, as it is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%>, and the firstlings <S%H1062><s%> of our herds <S%H1241><s%> and of our flocks <S%H6629><s%>, to bring <S%H935><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>, unto the priests <S%H3548><s%> that minister <S%H8334><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>;

and that we should bring <S%H935><s%> the first-fruits <S%H7225><s%> of our dough <S%H6182><s%>, and our heave-offerings <S%H8641><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of all manner of trees <S%H6086><s%>, the new wine <S%H8492><s%> and the oil <S%H3323><s%>, unto the priests <S%H3548><s%>, to the chambers <S%H3957><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>; and the tithes <S%H4643><s%> of our ground <S%H127><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%>; for they <S%H3881><s%>, the Levites, take the tithes <S%H6237><s%> in all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of our tillage <S%H5656><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall be with the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, when the Levites <S%H3881><s%> take tithes <S%H6237><s%>: and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall bring up <S%H5927><s%> the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of the tithes <S%H4643><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>, to the chambers <S%H3957><s%>, into the treasure <S%H214><s%> - house <S%H1004><s%>.

For the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> the heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> of the grain <S%H1715><s%>, of the new wine <S%H8492><s%>, and of the oil <S%H3323><s%>, unto the chambers <S%H3957><s%>, where are the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, and the priests <S%H3548><s%> that minister <S%H8334><s%>, and the porters <S%H7778><s%>, and the singers <S%H7891><s%>: and we will not forsake <S%H5800><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>.
